subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andrea Bargnani had 24 points and 12 rebounds, and the Raptors scored 39 points in the first quarter in an easy victory against the Knicks at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Andrea Bargnani had 24 points and 12 rebounds, and the Raptors scored 39 points in the first quarter in an easy victory against the Knicks at Madison Square Garden.
